topic.title: LAPAROTOMY FOR NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS INDICATION CODE
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether a laparotomy was required following a PATIENT DIAGNOSIS of Necrotising Enterocolitis; and if so, whether it was performed.
